topic.title: NUMBER OF PATIENT PARTNERS CONFIRMED AS ATTENDED A SEXUAL HEALTH SERVICE
topic.shortdesc: NUMBER OF PATIENT PARTNERS CONFIRMED AS ATTENDED A SEXUAL HEALTH SERVICE is the number of PATIENT partners confirmed by the CARE PROFESSIONAL as having attended a Sexual Health Service within four weeks of the Initial Partner Notification Discussion.
